title: 10: Hygiene in the shed? Let the cows tell you! Scoring system

tasks.task: Scoring system for shed hygiene in dairy farms
subtasks: Understand the causes of mastitis in dairy cows
Recognize different housing systems for dairy cows
Determine the importance of clean cows in reducing mastitis
Learn the three areas scored for hygiene: flank and tail, lower hind leg, and udder
Interpret scores of 0, 1, and 2 for each hygiene area
Identify shed hygiene issues based on scores (e.g., clean versus dirty cows)
Analyze potential problems in passageways, lying areas, or overall farm management based on dirtiness locations
Consider the significance of widespread dirtiness versus localized issues
